text:
@realDonaldTrump @Varneyco Herman Cain just died from COVID-19 after attending your rally in Tulsa.

Still onboard with your complete and total denial of science about this virus (or anything)?

You are a walking disaster.

#PleaseResignASAP.

Thanks!
